Promotional Info/Publisher's Summary - "They were legends based on mythsÃ¢â‚¬â€myths of fantasy, power, and black magic. The tales of their tours were the most outrageous in the already excess-laden annals of modern music. The era of Led Zeppelin personified sex, drugs, and rock & roll.
